metadata.title: CVE-2018-20197 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a stack-based buffer underflow in the third instance of thecalculate_gain function in libfaad/sbr_hfadj.c in Freeware Advanced AudioDecoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. A crafted input will lead to a denial of serviceor possibly unspecified other impact because limiting the additional noiseenergy level is mishandled for the G_max > G case.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.8-3ubuntu3
libfaad2 - 2.8.8-3ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3ubuntu3').
